venue.address_1: 45 South Main St., Suite 100, West Hartford, CT 06107
venue.name: Wu Healing Center

item.description: This meetup is a class that includes: 10 minutes of 5 element theory. Each class will focus on seasonally effected organs 40 minutes of opening channels to each organ system, including attunements throughout your session by a licensed massage therapist, Shiatsu and Reiki practitioner, focusing on pressure points that relieve tension and dis~harmony. Use of pure essential oils to help with Qi movement as well. All stretches can be modified and assisted. 10 minutes of guided meditation to support the internal healing process. Anyone can participate, young or old, healthy or dis~abled. Wear loose clothing and bring a yoga mat and towel/blanket. This will be a warm room , soft light, soft music and guided meditation. $10 donation
item.name: Healing Stretch
